definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Died to Murasame's Curse</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:MurasameCurseKill</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:MurasameCurseKill</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
